column1: Art Institute of Chicago////A couple of tips if you have never been here before:  Make sure you wear comfortable shoes
column2: as the museum is truly massive
column3: and you could easily spend an entire day wandering through its halls.  Also
column4: please note that there are no back packs or over sized bags allowed.  You will have to check them.  Additionally
column5: there is no food or drink allowed in the various galleries.  Feel free to take photos
column7: make sure that your flash is turned off.
